name: .DPG File Extension
summary: Learn about .DPG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video container format used for playing movie files on the Nintendo DS portable gaming device; may be converted from other video formats to DPG using MoonShell or another converter program.

content: Can be played on the Nintendo DS by transferring the DPG file to a DS-compatible GameBoy Advance card. May also be played back on a PC using supporting player.

NOTE: Several programs can be used for converting standard video files to the DPG format, including dpg4x and DPG Converter. However, to play a DPG file in Windows, use the dpgshow.exe program included with the Moonshell download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
